thread.title: DEMOCRATS “OFF-TARGET” AGAIN — UNFOCUSED ON REGULAR PEOPLE
thread.title_full: DEMOCRATS “OFF-TARGET” AGAIN — UNFOCUSED ON REGULAR PEOPLE

author: prbuzz.com
title: DEMOCRATS “OFF-TARGET” AGAIN — UNFOCUSED ON REGULAR PEOPLE
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Contact: Bob Harry
Tel: (561) 412-1856
Email: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
As Student Debt Hits The Headlines Yet Again — What About Regular People?
West Palm Beach, Fl., United States of America – September 18th, 2015 – As U.S. politics starts to heat up for election season, student debt has become a focus of many democratic candidates—but many Americans are starting to question what has happened to the conversation for adult Americans who suffered the meltdown of 2008, and in some cases, had no choice but to take out loans. These loans for many are still being paid off—and at an exorbitant cost.
“It’s not just students—what about regular, hard-working Americans who have suffered through the rocky waves of the financial crisis?” said Bob Harry, CEO of Debt Consolidation. “While we certainly agree with Clinton’s assertion that refinancing at a lower rate is good for society, we feel that this should refocused towards all who are suffering under a debt and finding it difficult to eliminate.”
Debt Consolidation works nationwide to help Americans to consolidate their debts into one refinanced monthly payment, taking away much of the stress of multiple bills and instead delivering one simple bill—and a better road toward debt elimination and the dream of many: financial freedom.
For more information about Debt Consolidation, visit http://www.reducemydebt.fla or call up (561) 412-1856 today.
About Debt Consolidation
Debt Consolidation is a new website that has been designed to help consumers experiencing financial issues to consolidate their outstanding debts into one manageable debt for easier loan elimination, leading back to a healthier financial future. For more information, please visit Debt Consolidation’s website .
Website: http://reducemydebtfla.com
Related: https://www.prbuzz.com/personal-finance/345353-consumers-find-new-ally-in-war-against-debt-1.html
